@brucucked yeah. I know what you mean. But it makes some sense when you think at who and what hentai targets. Straight sex Hentai is aimed at guys. And NTR tries to put us in the shoes of the guy being cucked. While this sort of NTR also puts in the shoes of the guy and sort of makes the cheating thrilling and fun. It’s like those cheating hentais where we see it from The POV of the guy doing the cheating with the wife and we never see the husband. We’re not primed to sympathize with the husband by the framing of the story.
